t: What cat tree brand do you recommend? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 3): Good morning Mike! Your question is somewhat difficult to answer because there isn’t a “one size fits all” when it comes to finding an outstanding cat tree which I can recommend. The best cat tree we found is one we discovered at a local cat show over 15 years ago.
